titleStmt.title: A transcendent spiritual treatise upon several heavenly doctrines from the Holy Spirit of the man Jesus, the only true God, sent unto all his elect as a token of his eternal love unto them, by the hand of his own prophet, beimg [sic] his last messenger, and witness, and forerunner of the visible appearing of the distinct personal God in power and great glory, in the clouds of Heaven, with his ten thousands of personal saints, to separate between the elect world, and the reprobate world, to all eternity : containing those several heads set down in the next page following / by John Reeve and Lodowick Muggleton, the two last witnesses and true prophets of the man Jesus ...
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.

titleStmt.title: A transcendent spiritual treatise upon several heavenly doctrines from the Holy Spirit of the man Jesus, the only true God, sent unto all his elect as a token of his eternal love unto them, by the hand of his own prophet, beimg [sic] his last messenger, and witness, and forerunner of the visible appearing of the distinct personal God in power and great glory, in the clouds of Heaven, with his ten thousands of personal saints, to separate between the elect world, and the reprobate world, to all eternity : containing those several heads set down in the next page following / by John Reeve and Lodowick Muggleton, the two last witnesses and true prophets of the man Jesus ...
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the authors, and are to be sold by them at the place above-named,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
